attributes.action: Install speed cameras and reduce to 40mph on B645 road (HailWeston stretch)
attributes.additional_details: Today 15th March the road is again closed due to overturned vechiles We simply need to install speed cameras and lower speeds on this road to save lives.
attributes.background:
B645 Notorious and dangerous road for speeding accidents and fatalities that could well be prevented by speed reduction and instalations of speed cameras  This route is a Red Route due to amount of incidents. 
This road is literally used and advertised as a race track for Cars and Bikes!

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. Safety on local roads is the responsibility of your local council.

You could raise your issue with a local councillor, who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:

https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
